puzzle.title: Boxes
puzzle.hint:
Identify the building/location which contains each of the named rooms.
NOTE: two of the location names are not in English, and a third is fictional!

Here are the locations for each room:
1844 Room - Buckingham Palace Pavillon de Flore - Palais du Louvre At The Top - Burj Khalifa Poets' Corner - Westminster Abbey Indian Hall - Monticello Oval Office - White House Room of Requirement - Hogwarts 1812 Military Gallery - Winter Palace Hall of Mirrors - Palace of Versailles USA Hall of Heroes - Pentagon
Have you tried INDEXING into the location names using the number on each box?
